ConnectionStrings.LibertyVillaConnectionString: Server = (localdb)\MSSQLLocalDB;Initial Catalog=LibertyVilla;Integrated Security=True;Persist Security Info=true;Encrypt=False;Connection Timeout=1500;

JWTConnectionKey.JWTKey: LibertyVilla Authorization key is used in authenticating application users into the application and likewise its it used in authorizing each of the users for proper management and security purpose
